title: MCAST MULTICAST VLAN TRANSLATION COMMAND
description: This command allows the operator configure source-pon vlan translation.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with igmp privileges, and executed by 
operators with igmp privileges.
syntax: > configure mcast-control ( no mc-vlan-xlate (nwvlan) ) | ( mc-vlan-xlate (nwvlan) ponvlan <Igmp::mcPonVlanId> )

resource_parameters.name: (nwvlan)
resource_parameters.description: identification of the network-side virtual lan

command_parameters.name: ponvlan
command_parameters.description: identification of the pon-side virtual lan mandatory parameter - vlan index - range: [1...4093]

raw:
help configure mcast-control mc-vlan-xlate
MCAST MULTICAST VLAN TRANSLATION COMMAND
========================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator configure source-pon vlan translation.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with igmp privileges, and executed by 
operators with igmp privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure mcast-control ( no mc-vlan-xlate (nwvlan) ) | ( mc-vlan-xlate 
(nwvlan) ponvlan <Igmp::mcPonVlanId> )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "mcast Multicast Vlan Translation Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(nwvlan)                   identification of the network-side virtual lan

Table "mcast Multicast Vlan Translation Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

ponvlan                    identification of the pon-side virtual lan
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Igmp::mcPonVlanId>
                           Format:
                           - vlan index
                           - range: [1...4093]


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
